channel.title: 667 hiscores
channel.description:
Am having a problem with my hiscores. And I hope someone could help me :P
Info: using Disturbed source ; testing hiscores on localhost
[b]The problem[/b] - Well whenever I logout the server save the Hiscores to mysql database, in my phpmyadmin page, all the starts and xp are saved there, but not in the hiscore page
phpmyadmin [IMG]http://i1351.photobucket.com/albums/p796/arkamys/phpmyadmin_zps73b68b90.png[/img]
hiscore page [IMG]http://i1351.photobucket.com/albums/p796/arkamys/hiscores_zps33b5a1db.png[/img]
Thank you
